pods.desc: Discussing various aspects of the Amazon Web Services (AWS) offering. Each podcast includes AWS news, tech tips, and interviews with startups, AWS partners, and AWS employees.

pods.name: AWS TechChat
pods.desc: A podcast series offering cloud enthusiasts, IT practitioners and developers the latest thinking and insights from AWS subject matter experts.

pods.name: Doppler Cloud Computing Podcast
pods.desc: Covering all things cloud while focusing on how to prepare the traditional enterprise to look beyond conventional computing.

pods.name: Google Cloud Platform Podcast
pods.desc: Discussing everything from on Google Cloud Platform from App Engine to Big Query.

pods.name: Remote Conference Talks
pods.desc: This feed contains several of the talks given at Remote Conference put on by Devchat.tv each month. Topics range from Ruby to JavaScript to community to tools and tricks.

pods.name: Data Science Storytime
pods.desc: A podcast all about data, science, stories, and time.

podcasts.subtitle: Podcasts related to Operations and DevOps

pods.name: Arrested DevOps
pods.desc: ADO is the podcast that helps you achieve understanding, develop good practices, and operate your team and organization for maximum DevOps awesomeness.

pods.name: Devops Cafe
pods.desc: Podcast with John Willis & Damon Edwards.

pods.name: DevOps Chat
pods.desc: Where the world meets DevOps.

pods.name: DevOps Radio
pods.desc: Covering all things related to software delivery.

pods.name: DevOps on AWS Radio
pods.desc: DevOps on AWS Radio covers topics on applying DevOps principles and practices such as Continuous Delivery on the AWS cloud.

pods.name: DevOps Mastery
pods.desc: This podcast is all about doing the DevOps thing. We are here to help you get from a DevOps newbie to being a DevOps Master.

pods.name: Docker for .NET Developers
pods.desc: An overview of what .NET developers need to know to build containerized applications using Docker.

pods.name: DockerCast
pods.desc: Dockercast is the official Docker Podcast which covers a wide range of topics including products, projects and contributions from active community members and partners with our host, Docker’s very own – John Willis.

pods.name: Kubecast
pods.desc: A podcast about kubernetes, schedulers, containers and the new world.This podcast is a series of interviews to relevant people in the community.

pods.name: PodCTL

pods.name: Puppet Podcast
pods.desc: The Puppet Podcast features Puppet community members talking about the latest trends in configuration management & cloud automation as well as DevOps culture.

pods.desc: The Chef Community Podcast, where DevOps engineeers do battle. This is not a cooking show.

pods.name: The New Stack Makers
pods.desc: The New Stack Makers stream of featured speakers and interviews is all about the new software stacks that change the way we development and deploy software.

pods.name: The Ship Show
pods.desc: A twice-montly podcast covering the finer points of build engineering, devops, & release management, including discussions, interviews, reviews, and coverage of important release engineering news and happenings.

pods.name: Coding Blocks

pods.desc: A weekly podcast targeted at the professional software developer that aims to  be a lasting educational resource, not a newscast.

pods.name: Soft Skills Engineering

pods.name: Talking Code

pods.name: Toolsday

podcasts.subtitle: Podcasts related to Linux/Unix Operating Systems

pods.name: BSD Now
pods.desc: A weekly show covering the latest developments in the world of the BSD family of operating systems. News, Tutorials and Interviews for new users and long time developers alike.

pods.name: Destination Linux
pods.desc: Destination Linux is hosted by two everyday guys who love running Linux. The discussions are down to earth and based on their real world experiences.

pods.name: Late Night Linux
pods.desc: Late Night Linux is a podcast that takes a look at what’s happening with Linux and the wider tech industry. Every two weeks, Joe, Jesse, Ikey and Félim discuss the latest news and releases, and the broader issues and trends in the world of free and open source software.

pods.name: Linux Action Show
pods.desc: The worlds #1 Linux podcast. A weekly show that covers the best in the open source and Linux world. Get a solid dose of Linux, gadgets, howto, reviews, and news every week!

pods.name: Linux Unplugged
pods.desc: The Linux Action Show with no prep, no limits, and tons of opinion. An open show powered by community LINUX Unplugged takes the best attributes of open collaboration and focuses them into a weekly lifestyle show about Linux.

pods.name: Unsupervised Learning

pods.name: Web Security Warriors
pods.desc: Web Security Warriors is a weekly discussion by developers about keeping websites, data, servers, and other internet outposts secure.
